member.name: T:BlurHashSharp.SkiaSharp.BlurHashEncoder
member.summary: The BlurHash encoder for use with the SkiaSharp image library.

member.name: M:BlurHashSharp.SkiaSharp.BlurHashEncoder.Encode(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Encodes the BlurHash representation of the image.
member.param: The IO stream of an encoded image.

member.name: M:BlurHashSharp.SkiaSharp.BlurHashEncoder.Encode(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the BlurHash representation of the image.
member.param: The path to an encoded image on the file system.

member.name: M:BlurHashSharp.SkiaSharp.BlurHashEncoder.Encode(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resizes the image and encodes the BlurHash representation of the image.
member.param: The path to an encoded image on the file system.
The maximum width to resize the image to.
The maximum height to resize the image to.
